comments.body: cc @cloud-fan when the ansi mode enabled, we can't implicitly cast decimal(38, 18) to long.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +4802,4806 @@    range(start: long, end: long)
    range(end: long)
cannot be applied to (decimal(38,18), decimal(38,18)): Incompatible input data type. Expected: long; Found: decimal(38,18); line 1 pos 14
